page.title: 18Professionals in Curdridge.
page.content: Many professional people live in Curdridge. We interviewed four of them, a dentist, solicitor, headmaster and chairman of an Industrial Tribunal. The dentist has a surgery in Hedge End. He has been a dentist for 26 years, having trained for five years. The solicitor works for a firm founded by his great-grandfather nearby in Fareham, helping clients with legal problems. The headteacher works locally at Swanmore Primary School, which has 300 children and 9 full-time teachers. The Chairman of an Industrial Tribunal is also the Reader at St.Peter's Church. They all enjoy working with people, and living in the country. Curdridge is a convenient and pleasant area in which to live, and Botley Station makes journeys to London easy.
